text: something like "no fancy linear algebra operations work until `using LinearAlgebra`" would probably be nice...

elements.text: something like "no fancy linear algebra operations work until

text:
I think this would be useful even for multiplication and other matrix operations. With `A, B` 2d arrays stuff like `A * B` and `exp(A)` would throw an error saying "want elementwise operations? add dot; want matrix operations? do `using LinearAlgebra`"
Of course, this is breaking, if reasonably possible at all...
